    • validateSafeMessage

    Function validateSafeMessage

    • validateSafeMessage(
          params: ValidateSafeMessageParams,
      ): Promise<ValidateSafeMessageResult>
      Function

      validateSafeMessage

      Parameters

      • params: ValidateSafeMessageParams

        Configuration parameters for Safe message validation

        • safeRpcUrl

          RPC URL for blockchain interaction

        • safeAddress

          Address of the Safe multisig wallet

        • litChainIdentifier

          Lit Protocol chain identifier

        • safeApiKey

          API key for Safe Transaction Service

        • safeMessageHash

          Hash of the message to validate

        • executingToolParams

          Expected tool parameters for validation

        • toolIpfsCid

          Expected IPFS CID of the tool

        • delegatorEthAddress

          Expected agent wallet address

        • appId

          Expected Vincent application ID

        • appVersion

          Expected Vincent application version

        • logPrefix

          Optional prefix for logging messages

      Returns Promise<ValidateSafeMessageResult>

      Promise resolving to validation result with success status and details

      Description

      Performs comprehensive validation of a Safe message for Vincent tool execution. This is the main validation function that orchestrates multiple validation steps to ensure a Safe message is authentic, properly signed, and safe for execution.

      The validation process includes:

      1. Message Retrieval: Fetches the Safe message from Transaction Service API
      2. Threshold Validation: Ensures sufficient owner confirmations exist
      3. EIP-712 Validation: Validates message structure and content against expected parameters
      4. Signature Validation: Verifies the cryptographic signature using Safe's isValidSignature
      5. Expiration Check: Ensures the message hasn't expired

      Throws

      When network requests fail or blockchain interactions error

      Throws

      When the Safe address is invalid or not accessible

      Example

      const result = await validateSafeMessage({
        safeRpcUrl: 'https://mainnet.infura.io/v3/...',
        safeAddress: '0x123...',
        litChainIdentifier: 'ethereum',
        safeApiKey: 'your-api-key',
        safeMessageHash: '0xabc...',
        executingToolParams: { amount: '1000', recipient: '0x456...' },
        toolIpfsCid: 'QmXxx...',
        delegatorEthAddress: '0x789...',
        appId: 1,
        appVersion: 1
      });

      if (result.success) {
        console.log('Message is valid - proceed with execution');
        const safeMessage = result.safeMessage;
      } else {
        console.error('Validation failed:', result.error);
        console.log('Details:', result.details);
      }

      See

      • ValidateSafeMessageParams for detailed parameter descriptions
      • ValidateSafeMessageResult for complete result structure

      Note

      This function includes comprehensive logging for debugging and audit purposes. All validation steps are performed sequentially with early returns on failure.
